paper_keywords: EOQ backorders, fuzzy sets, graded mean integration
paper_abstract: The paper considers an inventory model with backorders in a fuzzy situation by employing two types of fuzzy numbers, which are trapezoidal and triangular. A full-fuzzy model is developed where the input parameters and the decision variables are fuzzified. The optimal policy for the developed model is determined using the Kuhn-Tucker conditions after the defuzzification of the cost function with the graded mean integration (GMI) method. Numerical examples and a sensitivity analysis study are provided to highlight the differences between crisp and the fuzzy cases. (C) 2010 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An inventory model with backorders with fuzzy parameters and decision variables
